job.remarks:
Run every 15 minutes
AB Snergy 219 document: 00.621.671

step.datasource: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_Entity_Log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = %jobid% AND r.runid <> '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_Entity_Log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'

SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) -- 2023-08-10 HOO:Ensure at least one row result LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_Entity_Log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = 330 --AND r.runid <> '%runid%' -- 2023-08-10 HOO: Also quit when runid's are the same AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_Entity_Log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.jobid = r.jobid -- 2023-08-10 HOO: Check specifically whetehr given job is finished (not just any job in run id) AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'
step.stepname: Quit if Receipt task is running (330)

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET runid = '%runid%' , seqno = 100 -- technically you don't want to overwrite this when it is filled but it does not really matter to do the checks again , rowstatus = 1 , sysmessage = '' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder WHERE 1=1 AND ob.syscreated > '20200401' AND p.Status != 'C' AND ob.rowstatus = 0
step.stepname: Assign runid for prodorders with status != C

step.datasource:
UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET ch_aantal = pr.aantal , rowstatus = CASE WHEN pr.aantal IS NULL THEN -3 WHEN ISNULL(pr.aantal, 9000) > ob.Aantal THEN -2 ELSE 1 END , sysmessage = CASE WHEN pr.aantal IS NULL THEN 'No receipt found' WHEN ISNULL(pr.aantal, 9000) > ob.Aantal THEN 'More received than planned' ELSE '' END , seqno = 110 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder OUTER APPLY ( SELECT g.project, g.artcode, g.facode, SUM(g.aantal) as aantal FROM dbo._AB_sy_gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_Items i WITH (NOLOCK) ON g.artcode = i.ItemCode and g.reknr = i.GLAccountDistribution WHERE 1=1 AND g.transtype = 'N' AND g.transsubtype IN ( 'A', 'J' )
AND g.project = p.ProjectNr AND g.artcode = ob.artikel AND (g.facode = ob.serienummer OR i.IsSerialNumberItem = 0) GROUP BY g.project, g.artcode, g.facode ) pr WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 100 AND ob.rowstatus = 1 AND p.Status != 'C' -- Keep checking on status so that we don't have problems with users who finish the orders by hand
step.stepname: Get quantity received and set status accordingly

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = 1 , sysmessage = '' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.serienummer IS NULL AND ob.seqno = 110 AND ob.rowstatus = -2 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob2 WHERE 1=1 AND ob2.runid = ob.runid AND ob2.serienummer IS NULL AND ob2.seqno = ob.seqno AND ob2.rowstatus = ob.rowstatus GROUP BY ob2.Productieorder, ob2.Artikel, ob2.ch_aantal HAVING SUM(ob2.Aantal) = ob2.ch_aantal)
step.stepname: Check total amounts for status -2 lines without serial number and set status back when false alarm

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = CASE WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) = 0 THEN -3 WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) < ISNULL(r.QtyBudget, 0) THEN -3 WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) > ISNULL(r.QtyBudget, 0) THEN -1 ELSE 1 END , sysmessage = CASE WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) = 0 THEN 'No receipt found' WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) < ISNULL(r.QtyBudget, 0) THEN 'Not completed yet' WHEN ISNULL(r.QtyActual, 0) > ISNULL(r.QtyBudget, 0) THEN 'More received than planned' ELSE '' END , seqno = 120 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.ProjectNr, g.artcode , SUM(CASE WHEN g.transtype = 'B' AND g.freefield1 = 'P' THEN g.aantal ELSE 0 END) AS QtyBudget , SUM(CASE WHEN g.transtype IN ('N', 'X') THEN g.aantal ELSE 0 END) AS QtyActual FROM dbo._AB_sy_PRProject as p with (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_gbkmut as g with (nolock) on p.ProjectNr = g.project INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_Items as i with (nolock) on g.artcode = i.ItemCode and g.reknr = i.GLAccountDistribution WHERE 1=1 and p.Type = 'P' and p.Status != 'C' --= 'A' and g.transtype in('N', 'B') -- Ontvangst en geplande regels and g.transsubtype IN ( 'A', 'J') -- Ontvangstregels AND NOT (g.checked=0 AND g.blockitem=1 AND g.reviewed=1) -- this line makes the difference between original planned and extra GROUP BY p.ProjectNr, g.oms25, g.artcode ) r -- receipt total ON r.Projectnr = ob.Productieorder WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 110 AND ob.rowstatus = 1 AND p.Status != 'C'
step.stepname: Check planned vs realized qty for PO

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = -1 , seqno = 130 , sysmessage = 'One line in PO has error' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 120 AND ob.rowstatus = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ob2.runid = ob.runid AND ob2.productieorder = ob.productieorder AND ob2.rowstatus < 1)
step.stepname: Update - status of PO when one line has -

step.datasource:
UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = -3 -- retry , seqno = 131 , sysmessage = 'Has child POs that are not finished yet' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject pc WITH (NOLOCK) ON pc.ParentProject = p.ProjectNr WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 120 AND ob.rowstatus = 1
AND pc.[Status] != 'C'
step.stepname: Check if PO has not-finished child POs

step.datasource: -- Unchanged original query SELECT DISTINCT p.ProjectNr as project FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder WHERE ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 120 AND ob.rowstatus = 1 AND p.Status NOT IN ('C', 'B')
step.stepname: Take the PO's that still have status 1 and complete them

step.datasource: -- Select the ProductionOrder as project SELECT a.ProductionOrder AS project FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Prod_Process] a WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE a.ProductionOrder != 'PROD00198101.002' -- Filter based on ProcessReady and ExactPlanned AND a.ProcessReady >= ( SELECT ExactPlanned FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Exact_Planned_Open] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Productionorder = a.ProductionOrder ) AND a.LastModified < DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) -- Check for matching ExactReceived with ExactPlanned AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Exact_Received_Open] c WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE c.Productionorder = a.Productionorder AND c.ExactReceived = ( SELECT ExactPlanned FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_PRD_Exact_Planned_Open] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Productionorder = c.Productionorder ) ) -- Check for absence of Quantity of double booked serial numbers AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.ItemCode = g.artcode AND g.reknr = i.GLAccountDistribution INNER JOIN [400]..prproject pr WITH (NOLOCK) ON pr.projectnr = g.project WHERE g.project = a.ProductionOrder AND pr.status IN ('P', 'A') AND g.aantal > 0 AND i.IsSerialNumberItem = 1 GROUP BY g.project HAVING COUNT(*) = 2 )
step.stepname: Take open PO's with no double serial and planned = reveived and complete them

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = CASE WHEN p.Status = 'C' THEN 2 ELSE 0 END -- 0 = retry , seqno = 150 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' --AND ob.seqno = 120 -- LVE 210119 removed --AND ob.rowstatus = 1 -- LVE 210119 removed AND p.Status = 'C' -- only assign if status is ok

UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = ISNULL(e.POComplete_status, -1) , sysmessage = ISNULL(e.POComplete_mssg, 'No POComplete message found') , seqno = 150 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder OUTER APPLY(SELECT r.[rowstatus] as POComplete_status , CONCAT('PO Complete: ', REPLACE(r.[errormessage], 'Entiteit: Validatiefout, Property:,Message: ', '') COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) as POComplete_mssg FROM [ABEI].[dbo].[_AB_Entity_results] AS r WITH (nolock) WHERE 1=1 AND r.[jobid] = '%jobid%' AND r.[runid] = ob.runid AND r.Entity = 'ProductionComplete' AND r.[ReferenceValue] = ob.Productieorder COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ) AS e WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.seqno = 120 AND ob.rowstatus = 1 -- if status is still 1 something happened --AND p.Status = 'C' -- LVE 20201222 uit gezet omdat deze de execution van de rest in de weg staat, bovendien moet het != C zijn eigenlijk...

SELECT DISTINCT TOP (1000) Productieorder, Artikel , CASE WHEN rowstatus IN (-2, -3) AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%child%' AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%complete%' THEN Serienummer ELSE '' END as Serienummer , CASE WHEN rowstatus IN (-2, -3) AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%child%' AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%complete%' THEN CAST(Aantal as varchar(10)) ELSE '' END as Aantal , CASE WHEN rowstatus IN (-2, -3) AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%child%' AND sysmessage NOT LIKE '%complete%' THEN CAST(ch_aantal as varchar(10)) ELSE '' END as Aantal_Ontvangen , sysmessage as Opmerking , ob.rowstatus FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.rowstatus < 0 ORDER BY Productieorder, Artikel, ob.rowstatus
step.contentbody:
Hallo,

De volgende productieorders zijn niet automatisch afgehandeld.

Controleer het resultaat in Exact en handel ze eventueel handmatig af.






ProductieorderArtikelSerienummerAantalAantal_OntvangenOpmerking
%Productieorder%%Artikel%%Serienummer%%Aantal%%Aantal_Ontvangen%%Opmerking%
 


Deze mail is automatisch gegenereerd door ABEI om %abeinow%


run: %runid%
step.stepname: Send mail for lines that have error

step.datasource: SELECT ob.Productieorder FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' -- this run AND p.status = 'C' -- Completed -- Open OHW AND p.ProjectNr IN ( SELECT g.project--, SUM(g.aantal), SUM(g.bdr_hfl) FROM dbo._AB_sy_gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = g.project WHERE 1=1 AND g.reknr = ' 3800' AND g.datum > '2019-01-01' AND p.status = 'C' GROUP BY g.project HAVING (SUM(g.aantal) > 0.001) ) -- ohw > 0
step.contentbody:
Hallo,

Onderstaande productieorders hebben nog openstaande OHW regels, controleer deze a.u.b.:






Productieorder
%Productieorder%
 



Deze mail is automatisch gegenereerd door ABEI om %abeinow%

run: %runid%
step.settings: retryunique=0;uniquekey=;emailfrom=abei@orlaco.com;emailname=ABEI @ ES01;emailreplyto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=Let op, openstaande OHW regels voor afgehandelde productieorder;emailbodyusesource=0;emailsendifnoresults=0;emailcontentcolumns=Productieorder;mex_connectionid=0;
step.stepname: Check for remaining WIP lines and send mail for them

step.datasource: UPDATE ob WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = 0 --, sysmessage = '' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob INNER JOIN dbo._AB_sy_PRProject p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.ProjectNr = ob.Productieorder WHERE 1=1 AND ob.runid = '%runid%' AND ob.rowstatus <> 2 AND p.Status != 'C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[_AB_sy_PROD_GerProd_Process] ob2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ob2.runid = ob.runid AND ob2.productieorder = ob.productieorder AND ob2.rowstatus = -3)
step.stepname: Retry PO's without receipt or that were not complete yet
